references.paper_title: A survey of large language models
references.reason: This survey provides a broad overview of large language models, establishing a fundamental context for understanding the field.

references.paper_title: Deepseek-r1-lite-preview is now live: unleashing supercharged reasoning power!
references.reason: This paper introduces DeepSeek-R1, a pivotal model in the development of reasoning capabilities in language models, serving as a key benchmark for this work.

references.paper_title: Kimi k1.5: Scaling reinforcement learning with Ilms
references.reason: This paper explores scaling reinforcement learning with language models, providing insights on the techniques used, and which is highly relevant to the methodology in this research report.

references.paper_title: Technical report: Enhancing Ilm reasoning with reward-guided tree search
references.reason: This technical report explores enhancements to reasoning in language models using reward-guided tree search, offering a related method for improving reasoning abilities.

references.paper_title: Training language models to follow instructions with human feedback
references.reason: This paper explores the use of training language models to follow instructions with human feedback, which establishes a critical link between reinforcement learning and language models.
